document.full_text: the state of illinois is looking into allegations that several catholic groups providing adoption services for the state illegally discriminate against unmarried and gay couples, a lawsuit filed on tuesday showed.
document.title: illinois probing catholic groups for adoption discrimination
lines_and_colors: the state of illinois is looking into allegations that several catholic groups providing adoption services for the state illegally discriminate against unmarried and gay couples, a lawsuit filed on tuesday showed.
